trans-unit.source: Allows coordination of initialization for a component and its dependent properties.
trans-unit.target: Permite a coordenação da inicialização para um componente e suas propriedades dependentes.

trans-unit.source: You should implement this interface when your component has initialization dependencies on other components that also implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: Você deve implementar esta interface quando o componente tem dependências de inicialização em outros componentes que também implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the dependent components have completed initialization by checking the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode verificar se os componentes dependentes concluiu a inicialização, verificando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> types.
Occurs when initialization of the component is completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a inicialização do componente é concluída.

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs during the call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method for the component, but it may occur later if the component has dependent controls that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface and the dependent controls have not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento geralmente ocorre durante a chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> método para o componente, mas pode ocorrer mais tarde se o componente tiver dependentes controles que implementam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface e os controles dependentes não concluiu a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o componente é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar o componente concluiu a inicialização; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property is automatically set to `false` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A> method is called, and `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> propriedade é definida automaticamente como `false` quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A> método é chamado, e `true` quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> método é chamado.
